desc:
There are too many BIPs, some are implemented, some are old discarded ideas, some are promising proposals for the future, each has its own history and arguments and counter-arguments.

It would be nice to have a summary of each along with its story, timeline, people involved and so on.

This effort doesn't have to include all BIPs, but must be good and original work.
head: A guide for the Bitcoin BIPs
